name: Fire After a Intense Autumn Rain
name_original: Fire After a Intense Autumn Rain
description:
Fight against monsters! Collect logs! And keep your campfire lit! In this arcade like game made for Vimjam 3 and the Cozy Autumn Game Jam

------------------------------------------------------

Logs have multiple-uses as health for you and your campfire. And use then to upgrade your speed and strength stats.

------------------------------------------------------

Turn Up the Heat with your campfire! Use your logs in the campfire  to increase the difficulty of the game. There are 6 levels of difficulty:

- Easy (Basic Enemy)

- Medium (Gigant Enemy)

- Hard (Chaser Enemy)

- Very Hard (All of them)

- Boss

- Endless (Tally uo your score and see how far can you go)

-------------------------------------------------------

CONTROLS: 

- WASD: Move

- J: Attack

- K: Interact

- Spacebar: Start Raid

- Left Mouse Button: Choose Upgrade

- R: Restart 

- ESC: Close Game

Credits:

- Art: Romulo & A Half 

-Music: Chris Haugen - Campfire Song  

-SFX: SFXR
